name: Little Town Robbers
description:
Little Town Robbers

Another university project. This time a reto-arcade styled game. You characters just robbed a high stakes bank and just barely got away with it. Now it is up to you, to get them to the safety of their hideout, where they can bask in their riches.

Year 1 - Third Term

Team: 

  • Artist: Chris Peters (2D Promotional Art)
  • Artist: Liam van Asten (2D Ingame Art & 3D Model)
  • Artist: Wouter de Vries (Sound Design)
  • Designer: Ihor Zhmurko (Game Design & Documentation)
  • Designer: Kevin Vazdautanu (Game Design & Documentation)
  • Engineer: Brynn Rothuis (Programming)
  • Engineer: Yavor Fotinov (Programming)
